posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jeff Prizner
Selling my framed t206 reverse advertising display piece that I bought on t206.org.

Mine has a black frame with a gray mat and has all the cards (reprints) lined up in one row alphabetically (similar to the black frame in the pic below but w/ a gray mat).

Paid $200, selling for $100 delivered.  Very cool display piece (especially for t206 fans), just trying to free up some wall space!

[IMG]http://www.t206.org/images/framedbacks001.jpg[/IMG]

edited: hope you don't mind the borrowed scan Trae!  [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

Posted By: Eric
i would love that frame if it held PSA graded cards and looked like that!

Posted By: Trae R.
No worries on the image, Jeff. I'm sorry to see it's one of the items to go to free up wall space. No big deal though, I would be happy to provide better images of pieces like yours if anyone needs a better look to make a buying decision, just drop me a line.

"There ain't much to being a ballplayer, if you're a ballplayer."
-Honus Wagner

Posted By: Trae R.
